    • Matrix

      public Matrix()

      public Matrix(int nLines, int mColumns, int modulus)

    • Matrix

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(Matrix matrix)
      Constructor to copy a Matrix into a new object. This constructor uses the resizing constructor, but instead of passing new values for nLines and mColumns, it simply uses the current values from the Matrix passed in argument.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The Matrix to be copied.
      See Also:
      • Matrix(Matrix, int, int)

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(Matrix matrix, int newN, int newM)
      Constructor to create a bigger/smaller Matrix based on the Matrix passed as an argument.

      In the case that the new nLines or mColumns is bigger than the current value, the new positions will be filled with zeros. In the case that these are smaller, then the new Matrix will be truncated.

      Parameters:
      matrix - The Matrix that is the basis of the new smaller/bigger Matrix.
      newN - The new number of lines.
      newM - The new number of columns.
